card.headerText: Lesson 1 â€¢ Talking about a new project

descriptions.description: Carl, Greg and Anne work for WaterSonic Corporation. Recently, the company has come up with an idea for a new electric toothbrush.

enText.text: Carl: I think we've come up with a winner.
Anne: I agree. The new Brush-o-matic should be a blockbuster!
Carl: Our designers have already made up some prototypes. The toothbrushes have a tooth-whitening attachment and many other bells and whistles.
Greg: We should fast track a project. Let's try to launch it in time for the holiday season.

enText.enText: Ane: This will be a great stocking stuffer!

enText.text: Carl: We definitely need a big win for the holidays.
Anne: This is a great idea. We're going to make a killing.
Greg: Let's not talk about this project to anybody who doesn't need to know. We'll keep something under wraps.
Carl: I agree mum's the word. We don't want any of our competitors to get wind of the idea and rip it off.
Anne: Right. Let's meet again on Monday morning and discuss our game plan for getting this project off the ground!
